Chronicle's Gabrielle Lurie wins Local Photographer of the Year for third straight year

The Chronicle’s Gabrielle Lurie was unanimously selected by a panel of judges to receive the prestigious award for her work documenting communities in the Bay Area and across California. She is the first newspaper photographer to win three years in a row.
